modName: Bear-Claw Home - An Imperial Player Home
summary: Adds a player home near morthal
descriptionHtml:
This player home adds a farm, blacksmith forge, armor workbench, sharpening wheel, stables, two horses, and, of course, a home.

There are 2 actors that will tend to the farm. Heildon will get wood, and chop wood, and Heilda will just stand at the farm, tend to it, or just eat. Please ignore the fact that they run into fences until they just teleport through. I am still working on that. Please leave suggestions and if there are any bugs also say them so i can fix them ASAP. Enjoy!

The key is in the Jarl\'s house in Morthal, on the fireplace. I will also leave pictures if you don\'t see it.
author: R3D5K1N
